data.text: @kcheek Hi, Kristi. All routes are current through mid-May 2023. The dates will be shown in bold to select from on our online calendar. If not in bold then we are not offering a flight for your route and/or date of interest. Please DM us with further questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

data.text:
SSD Seeker - named in honor of Allegiant's @Sunseeker Resort - is a service animal in training with @SSDOGS. 
 
Over the next two years, we'll provide air travel for her and her trainer as she learns everything she needs to be matched with a permanent partner. 
 
#TogetherWeFly https://t.co/jQYiCf9RDZ

data.text:
The people have spoken, and Allegiant's Allways Rewards® is officially the No. 1 "Best Frequent Flyer Program" according to this year's USA Today 10Best Readers' Choice Awards. 

Not a member yet? Visit https://t.co/lIXXr52oBV to sign up for free today! 

📸: wes.aviation https://t.co/vEdzwSCglp

data.text: According to Jeff and Rachel, flexibility is key to being a great air traffic controller. And trust us - they're experts. As veteran controllers, they now serve as our air traffic control coordinators to facilitate communication with the FAA so we can keep our aircraft moving! https://t.co/esNZG1Ohl4

data.text:
Love was literally in the air when Blake proposed to his girlfriend, Ashton, on their Allegiant flight from Tulsa to Las Vegas. Not only did she say yes, but they had their first dance as an engaged couple on the flight.

Congratulations to the happy couple! 🎉🎉

#SheSaidYes https://t.co/rajQcT4b3E
